definition: a long-handled pruning saw with a curved blade at the end and sometimes a clipper
details:
noun
- a long-handled pruning saw with a curved blade at the end and sometimes a clipper
= example: a long-handled pruning saw with a curved blade at the end and sometimes a clipper
= synonyms: pruning hook
- a worker who thins out and trims trees and shrubs
= example: a worker who thins out and trims trees and shrubs
= synonyms: trimmer
